TopicTitle: Cargo Pallets Wanted! - For Giving Aircraft a Purpose Contract Pack

Articles.Content:
Want to have your creation added to a contract pack?  I am looking for cargo based subassemblies that are creative that can be transported in Mk2 or Mk3 cargo bays. Something like this:


If you have a cargo subassembly you'd like to share feel free to post a link and pic and if it looks good, I'll include it in the Contract Pack: Giving Aircraft a Purpose mod.

Any volunteers?

 

Players will be responsible for either loading them into their airplanes either via subassembly, or picking them from the Space Plane Hangar loading area via KAS by any other means of attaching material to a plane for transport.

Edited May 12, 2016 by inigma

I've made a pallet of structural plates are radially attached ore tanks stacked on top of each other. I usually put them on target ships for testing torpedoes or missiles, but they might work here. I'll see if I can post some pictures this afternoon.
want them to have weight? and size based on Cargo bays?

I've got just the thing for you:

These pallets are made to fit MK-3 cargo-bays and they are made so you can drop them mid-flight.

2 hours ago, kinnison said:

want them to have weight? and size based on Cargo bays?

Yes and yes. I'm looking for part counts under 30 if possible.
